tool_description: Getting News in real-time via API from Social Medias like Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, etc
name: OneLike
title: OneLike

api_list.name: Social Media News in Greek
api_list.description: Get social media news in Greek
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://onelike1.p.rapidapi.com/servicegr/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "onelike1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:

url = "https://onelike1.p.rapidapi.com/servicegr/news"

test_endpoint.messages: Base URL is missing or is not configured properly
